intended_use_inference.statement: Deterministic Bio-AI research/validation platform where contributors install dev deps, run CLI/simulation workflows, execute tests/lint/type checks, and build docs/wheels.

notes: Focused on onboarding docs, build/test configs, and canonical new-user workflow commands.

blockers.title: Canonical test command fails after setup due incompatible proof_bundle/index.json structure
blockers.expected: Canonical test suites should exit 0 after documented install path.
blockers.actual: `python -m pytest tests -q` and `python -m pytest -m "not validation" -q` both fail with `TypeError: string indices must be integers, not 'str'` when iterating proof index entries.
blockers.root_cause_hypothesis: tests/test_audit_suite_artifacts.py expects proof_bundle/index.json to be a list of objects, but file is an object with top-level artifacts array; format drift likely between producer and test contract.
fix_minimal_plan: Align producer and test contract for proof_bundle/index.json (choose list schema or update test parser).
Add contract check to prevent future schema drift.

blockers.title: Build gate command unavailable in documented dev environment
blockers.symptom: `python -m build` fails because module `build` is not installed after canonical dev install.
blockers.expected: Build verification command should run after following onboarding install instructions.
blockers.actual: `python -m build` returns `/python: No module named build`.
blockers.root_cause_hypothesis: The [dev] extra in pyproject.toml does not include `build`, while AGENTS and CI build gate require `python -m build`.
fix_minimal_plan: Include `build` in the extra/profile used by local build checks (e.g., dev/test) or adjust documented build prerequisite command.
Keep CI and local docs/install path consistent.

improvements.title: AGENTS-recommended pylint command depends on pre-install state
improvements.note: Before install pylint is missing, after install command passes.
